name: QWERTY
description:
IPCA Game Jam 2017 Entry

An 8 year old boy lost his best friend, Qwerty, and finds an hourglass that takes him to the spirit world.
With its power, Oli goes on an adventure, searching for his lost friend. But the world is full with danger and strange entities that watch him since his arrival...


Controls:
SPACE jump
WASD or arrows walk
Q use power
K interact with the world
